name: The Annual Conference on Engineering and Applied Science
content: Organized by Higher Education Forum (HEF), The Annual Conference on Engineering and Applied Science (ACEAT) is an international platform for scholars, researchers and practitioners to discuss interdisciplinary research and practices in the fields of Engineering and Applied Science and more. 2017 ACEAT will take place from November 6-8 , 2017 in Fukuoka, Japan. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals.
